version_description:
1. Optimized UI and art performance
2. Fixed known bugs

1. Optimized UI and art performance
2. Fixed known bugs

1. Added Leaderboard function
2. Optimized UI and art performance
3. Fixed known bugs

[Character Level-up] The power display will be prompted when the character has levelled-up
[Survey] Diamond Rewards Amount Adjustment
[Monthly Pack] Pack Content Edit
[February Event New Content - Valentine's Day]
[Gallery Optimization] When activating or upgrading the gallery, the power change will be shown in the gallery page
[Auto Dismantling] The dropped gear with a specific quality in battle will be dismantled automatically upon the end of the battle
Added [Match Mode] gamemode
